trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality required by a spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Implementerer grunnleggende funksjonaliteten som kreves av en rotasjon boks (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: A spin box consists of a text box and a small vertical scroll bar, commonly referred to as a spin button control.
trans-unit.target: En rotasjon for består av en tekstboks og en liten loddrette rullefeltet ofte referert til som en rotasjon for knappekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The UpDownBase class links the two controls and allows the user to change the display in the text box by clicking the up or down buttons or by entering the appropriate type of value directly into the text box.
trans-unit.target: Klassen UpDownBase koblinger to kontrollerer og tillater brukeren å endre visningen i teksten boksen ved å klikke opp eller nedknappene eller ved å angi riktig verditypen direkte i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: Use the spin box in cases where you want to limit the list of values a user can select, similar to a list box or combo box.
trans-unit.target: Bruk boksen Rotasjon i tilfeller der du ønsker å begrense listen over verdier for en bruker kan velge ligner en liste eller kombinasjonsboks.

trans-unit.source: Depending upon the type of list you want to display, the advantage to using a spin box is that it allows you to quickly set a range of valid values, rather than adding items one at a time.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av listetypen du vil vise, er fordelen ved å bruke en rotasjon boks at du raskt sette et område med gyldige verdier i stedet for å legge til elementer én om gangen.

trans-unit.source: Implementing a spin box requires less data validation than a text box, as you can limit the data type when you derive a class from UpDownBase.
trans-unit.target: Krever implementering av en rotasjon for mindre datavalidering enn en tekstboks som du kan begrense datatypen når du avledet en klasse fra UpDownBase.

trans-unit.source: An example of this is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> class, which limits the values to the numeric type and uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Maximum%2A> property to validate the data.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på dette er den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>klassen som begrenser verdiene som numerisk type og bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Minimum%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Maximum%2A>til å validere dataene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>

trans-unit.source: To allow the user to use the arrow keys to change the contents of a spin box, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.InterceptArrowKeys%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å tillate brukeren som skal brukes i piltaster til å endre innholdet i en rotasjon-boksen, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.InterceptArrowKeys%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.InterceptArrowKeys%2A>

trans-unit.source: To restrict the user to values you specify, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å begrense brukeren til verdiene du angir, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: To control the alignment of text in the spin box, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.TextAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å styre justering av tekst i boksen rotasjon, angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.TextAlign%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.TextAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set the alignment of the up and down buttons in relation to the text box portion of the control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpDownAlign%2A> property to either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi justering av opp- og nedknappene i forhold til tekstboksen i kontrollen, kan du angi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpDownAlign%2A>egenskapen enten <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpDownAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpButton%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DownButton%2A> methods, when overridden, handle the clicking of the up or down buttons.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpButton%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DownButton%2A>metoder, når overstyrt, behandle ved å velge opp eller nedknappene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DownButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A> methods validate the value (either selected or entered) and update the text displayed in the spin box.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A>metoder validere verdien (enten valgt eller angitt) og oppdatere teksten som vises i boksen rotasjon.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value fails validation, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Select%2A> method to select the text that is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien ikke validering, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Select%2A>metoden merke tekst som ikke er gyldig.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows the user to quickly correct the text by simply typing in a new value without having to manually select or delete the existing text.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar brukeren raskt Korriger teksten ved å skrive inn en ny verdi uten å velge manuelt, eller Slett den eksisterende teksten.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)], the UpDownBase control will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: Med start av [!INCLUDE[net_2015](~/add/includes/net-2015-md.md)], UpDownBase kontrollen skal endre størrelse basert på systeminnstillingen ppt når app.config-filen inneholder følgende oppføring:``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the container will allow the user to scroll to any controls placed outside of its visible boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om beholderen tillater brukeren å bla til kontroller plasseres utenfor grensene synlige.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> control does not use the AutoScroll property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>kontrollen ikke bruke egenskapen AutoScroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the auto-scroll margin.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen på margen for automatisk rulling.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> control does not use the AutoScrollMargin property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>kontrollen ikke bruke egenskapen AutoScrollMargin.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the height and width, in pixels, of the auto-scroll margin.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer høyden og bredden på automatisk rulling margen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> or <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *> eller <> </> *> er mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum size of the auto-scroll area.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir minimumsstørrelsen for automatisk rulling-området.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> control does not use the AutoScrollMinSize property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>kontrollen ikke bruke egenskapen AutoScrollMinSize.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the minimum height and width, in pixels, of the scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som representerer minste høyden og bredden på side-felt i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should automatically resize based on its contents.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen skal skaleres automatisk på nytt basert på innholdet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the control should automatically resize based on its contents; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>for å angi kontrollen skal skaleres automatisk på nytt basert på innholdet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoSize*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoSize*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the text box portion of the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsfargen for tekstboksen i boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of the text box portion of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer bakgrunnsfargen for tekstboksen i boksen rotasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bakgrunnsbildet for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The BackgroundImage property has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> control; therefore, it is hidden in the designer and from IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BackgroundImage påvirker ikke hvordan det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>kontrollere; derfor den er skjult i utviklerprogrammet og fra IntelliSense.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>

trans-unit.source: The background image for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnsbilde for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImage*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImage*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the layout of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImage*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir oppsettet for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImage*>av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.source: The BackgroundImageLayout property has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> control; therefore, it is hidden in the designer and from IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BackgroundImageLayout har ingen innvirkning på hvordan det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>kontrollere; derfor den er skjult i utviklerprogrammet og fra IntelliSense.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImageLayout*>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjestil for boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A> property to create borderless and flat controls in addition to the default three-dimensional control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A>til å opprette uten kanter og flate kontrollerer i tillegg til standard tredimensjonale kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text property is being changed internally by its parent class.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om text-egenskapen endres internt med sin overordnede klasse.

trans-unit.source: The ChangingText property acts as a flag for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ChangingText fungerer som et flagg for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>

trans-unit.source: This property is used by derived classes to indicate when the class is changing the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> property internally.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes av avledede klasser som viser når klassen endrer gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>egenskapen internt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, the control requires that the user is changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> property and will set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `false`, kontrollen krever at brukeren endrer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>egenskapen og setter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text*> property is being changed internally by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"></xref> class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text*>egenskapen endres internt av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"> </xref> klasse; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hurtigmenyen tilknyttet rotasjon boksen (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to associate a shortcut menu with a tree node is with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den foretrukne måten å knytte en hurtigmeny til en trenode er med i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ContextMenuStrip%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"></xref> associated with the spin box.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"> </xref> tilknyttet rotasjon-boksen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hurtigmenyen for boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: The shortcut menu appears when the user right-clicks the spin box.
trans-unit.target: Hurtigmenyen vises når brukeren høyreklikker boksen rotasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> tilknyttet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Henter oppretting av nødvendige parameterne når kontrollen referansen opprettes.

trans-unit.source: The creation parameters.
trans-unit.target: Oppretting av parameterne.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardstørrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the dock padding settings for all edges of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter forankringen utfylling innstillinger for alle kantene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase> control does not use the DockPadding property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>kontrollen ikke bruke egenskapen DockPadding.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase>

trans-unit.source: The dock paddings settings for this control.
trans-unit.target: Forankringen paddings innstillingene for denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, handles the clicking of the down button on the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, behandler ved å velge for knappen ned i boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has input focus.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen er inndata fokus.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen har fokus. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forgrunnsfargen for boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: The ForeColor property will change the color of the text in the textbox portion of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ForeColor endres fargen på teksten i tekstboksen refererer til rotasjon.

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: Forgrunnen <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> for boksen rotasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can use the UP ARROW and DOWN ARROW keys to select values.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukeren kan bruke pil opp og pil ned for å velge verdier.

trans-unit.source: If the InterceptArrowKeys property is set to `true` and the spin box (also known as an up-down control) has focus, the user can use the UP ARROW and DOWN ARROW keys to select values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen InterceptArrowKeys er satt til `true` og boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll) er i fokus, brukeren kan bruke pil opp og pil ned for å velge verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control allows the use of the UP ARROW and DOWN ARROW keys to select values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen tillater bruk av pil opp og pil ned for å velge verdier. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size of the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den maksimale størrelsen på boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the specified value, the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> of the maximum size will always be 0.
trans-unit.target: Uavhengig av den angitte verdien av <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>av maksimumsstørrelsen vil alltid være 0.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>, which is the maximum size of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>, som er maksimumsstørrelsen på boksen rotasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum size of the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir minimumsstørrelsen for boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>, which is the minimum size of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>, som er minimumsstørrelsen for boksen rotasjon.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Skjer når musepekeren den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når musepekeren holdes over den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når musepekeren forlater den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer over the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren flytter pekeren over den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, raises the Changed event.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, opphøyer Changed-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.

trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår en Dobbeltklikk, metoden OnMouseUp kan øke det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: If the spin box (also known as an up-down control) has focus when this event occurs, the direction the user scrolled the mouse wheel is determined, and either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpButton%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DownButton%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Hvis rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll) har fokus når denne hendelsen oppstår, retningen brukeren rullet musen hjulet bestemmes, og enten den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpButton%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DownButton%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DownButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.InterceptArrowKeys%2A> property is set to `true` and the user presses the UP ARROW key, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpButton%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.InterceptArrowKeys%2A>er satt til `true` og brukeren trykker pil, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpButton%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.InterceptArrowKeys%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, if the user presses the DOWN ARROW key, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DownButton%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte, hvis brukeren trykker pil, den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DownButton%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.DownButton%2A>

trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This method validates the text in the text box portion of the control when the spin box (also known as an up-down control) loses focus.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden validerer teksten i tekstboksen i kontrollen når boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll) mister fokus.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Metoden OnTextBoxLostFocus kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This method adjusts the size of the spin box (also known as an up-down control) when the text box portion of the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden justerer størrelsen på boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll) når tekstboksen i kontrollen endres.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Metoden OnTextBoxResize kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen.

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Henter høyden på rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: The PreferredHeight property value is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.PreferredHeight%2A> property of the text box portion of the control and is adjusted for the style of border.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien PreferredHeight er basert på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.PreferredHeight%2A>for tekstboksen i kontrollen og justeres for stilen på kantlinjen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.PreferredHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the spin box.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på boksen Rotasjon i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text can be changed by the use of the up or down buttons only.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om teksten kan endres ved bruk av opp eller nedknappene bare.

trans-unit.source: By setting the ReadOnly property to `true`, you will eliminate the need for much validation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ved å sette ReadOnly-egenskapen til `true`, du vil unngå behovet for mye validering av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user will be restricted to the use of the up and down buttons to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren vil være begrenset til bruk av opp- og nedknappene til å endre den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>verdier.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: It will only allow them to select values you specify.
trans-unit.target: Det kan bare dem til å velge verdier som du angir.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>, the behavior described is slightly different.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I den utledede klassen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>, virkemåten som er beskrevet er litt annerledes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>

trans-unit.source: When ReadOnly is set to `true` and a key is pressed, the control selects the first item in the collection where the first character matches the key pressed.
trans-unit.target: Når ReadOnly er satt til `true` og en tast, kontrollen velges det første elementet i samlingen der det første tegnet samsvarer med nøkkelen trykket.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text can be changed by the use of the up or down buttons only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis teksten kan endres ved bruk av opp eller nedknappene. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Selects a range of text in the spin box (also known as an up-down control) specifying the starting position and number of characters to select.
trans-unit.target: Velg en rekke teksten i boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll) som angir start plasseringen og antallet tegn du velger.

trans-unit.source: The Select method can be used when the spin box gets focus, or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> property fails data validation.
trans-unit.target: Velg metoden som kan brukes når boksen rotasjon henter fokus, eller når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>egenskapen mislykkes datavalideringen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: When adding the validation code for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A> method in a derived class, call the Select method when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til valideringskoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A>i en avledet klasse metodekall metoden Select når validering mislykkes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position of the first character to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Posisjonen til det første tegnet velges.

trans-unit.source: The total number of characters to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Totalt antall tegn som skal velges.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises i boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A> method is called if the Text property is set while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A>metoden hvis Text-egenskapen er angitt under den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A> method is called if the Text property is set while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A>metoden hvis Text-egenskapen er angitt under den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UserEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string value displayed in the spin box.
trans-unit.target: Strengverdien i boksen rotasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for teksten i boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, handles the clicking of the up button on the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, behandler ved å velge for knappen oppdaterte i boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, updates the text displayed in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, oppdaterer du teksten som vises i boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the up and down buttons on the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for opp- og nedknappene boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LeftRightAlignment"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a value has been entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en verdi er angitt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> property is set while the UserEdit property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>egenskapen er angitt under UserEdit-egenskapen er satt til `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.UpdateEditText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A> property is set while the UserEdit property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>egenskapen er angitt under UserEdit-egenskapen er satt til `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.ValidateEditText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user has changed the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text*> property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren er endret av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text*>egenskapen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase.Text*>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, validates the text displayed in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, validerer teksten som vises i boksen rotasjon (også kjent som en opp / ned-kontroll).

trans-unit.source: Some examples of validation include comparing the text entered to the data type set in your derived class, comparing the text to a list of values, or verifying the text to be within a range of values.
trans-unit.target: Noen eksempler på validering sammenligne den angitte til datatypen som er angitt i den utledede klassen sammenligne teksten som en liste over verdier, eller bekrefte teksten er i et verdiområde teksten.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Behandler Windows meldinger.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> prosessen.
